alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Ontario; Wayne (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 3:28AM EST until January 21 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in most areas, with 5 to 8 inches possible in the most persistent lake snows from near Webster into western Wayne County. Northwest winds gusting up to 30 mph will produce some limited blowing snow this afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Monroe, Wayne, and Ontario counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. The heaviest snow is expected to be this afternoon and evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult with snow covered roads and poor visibility. The greater travel impacts are expected this afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: Lake effect snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
